wiki.aliases: Posed as an officer in the Soviet Army for years
wiki.occupation: (Formerly) military leader of Earth's Eternals, military leader of Polar-Eternals, was a high-ranking military aide in the soviet Army
wiki.citizenship: (as Aginar) Polaria; (as military aide) former Union of Soviet Socialist Republic
wiki.powers: Aginar is an Eternal and like all Eternals he can manipulate cosmic energy for a variety of effects. He has total mastery over his physical form granting him virtually immortality and the ability to recover from most wounds except for injuries which discorporate a majority of his body. He has superhuman strength enabling him to lift 25 tons. He can use his energy to levitate and fly at Mach One. He can convert his cosmic energy into heat, light, or concussive force which he can discharge from his hands or his eyes. Aginar has low-level psychic abilities enabling him to cast illusions disguising his appearance. He can also read the minds of anyone with lesser psychic abilities. All Eternals also have the ability to join minds with other Eternals forming the [[Uni-Mind]].
wiki.abilities: Excellent hand-to-hand combatant, especially well versed in wrestling and boxing techniques. Aginar has mastered all of the Eternals advanced weaponry. He also has advanced knowledge of military history, tactics, and strategies.
wiki.paraphernalia: Aginar normally wears a helmet and armor composed of unknown materials which were designed by the Eternals of Polaria.
wiki.bio_text: Aginar was last seen linked into the [[Uni-Mind]] which took off into deep space.
wiki.bio: Aginar was last seen linked into the [[Uni-Mind]] which took off into deep space.
